text:
Progyny | Senior Front End Developer | New York, NY (NYC) | Full Time - On Site

Progyny is a digital health company specializing in pregnancy and embryo technology. Our main goal is to enhance every person's ability to have a child to call their own. We are able to do this through the use of data models, medical device technology, web sites for patient education, standardized programs and more.

We use PHP, Drupal, Laravel, Varnish, React JS, and more.

https://www.progyny.com/join-our-team
